i1.name: Bravado
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} After casting an [[champion ability|ability]], '''Taric's''' next two [[basic attack]]s within 5 seconds gain {{sti|as|{{as|100% '''total''' attack speed}}}}, each dealing {{as|{{pp|25 to 93}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 15% '''bonus''' armor)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and {{sti|cdr|reducing}} the cooldowns of his basic abilities by {{tt|1 second|Increased by ability haste}}.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: After casting an champion ability, Taric's next two basic attacks within 5 seconds gain 100% total attack speed, each dealing 25 âˆ’ 93 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus armor) bonus magic damage and reducing the cooldowns of his basic abilities by 1 second.
i1.notes:
* The first attack refreshes ''Bravado's'' duration.
* The bonus damage will not apply against {{tip|structures}}.
* ''Bravado'' can be {{tip|dodged}} and {{tip|blocked}} but it cannot miss if '''Taric''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}. The cooldown reduction cannot be negated in any cases.

q1.name: Starlight's_Touch
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Taric''' periodically [[ammunition|stocks]] a charge of ''Starlight's Touch'', up to a maximum amount. ''{{ai|Bravado|Taric}}''-empowered attacks each grant one charge.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Taric''' {{tip|heals}} himself and nearby allied champions for 25 {{as|(+ 15% AP)}} {{as|(+ 1% of Taric's '''maximum''' health)}} per stored charge, up to a maximum of 125 {{as|(+ 75% AP)}} {{as|(+ 5% of Taric's '''maximum''' health)}} at 5 charges.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Taric periodically ammunition a charge of Starlight's Touch, up to a maximum amount. Taric's Bravado-empowered attacks each grant one charge.
Active: Taric heals himself and nearby allied champions for 25 (+ 15% AP) (+ 1% of Taric's maximum health) per stored charge, up to a maximum of 125 (+ 75% AP) (+ 5% of Taric's maximum health) at 5 charges.
q1.notes: * The healing will apply heal effects (such as {{ri|Summon Aery}}) prioritizing targets in '''Taric's''' circle, based on proximity to him, then in the {{ai|Bastion|Taric|Bastioned}} ally's circle, based on proximity to that ally (including it).

w1.name: Bastion
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Taric''' gains {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and forms a {{tip|tether}} between him and the ally bound by ''Bastion''. While the tether persists, the ally also gains the {{as|'''bonus''' armor}} and '''Taric's''' abilities are mimicked to them, though the effects do not stack.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Taric''' {{tip|shields}} himself and the target allied champion for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, binding them with ''Bastion''.

'''Taric''' can also [[self-targeted|self-cast]] to shield himself; if he is untethered, this will instead target the nearest ally. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Taric gains bonus armor and forms a tether between him and the ally bound by Bastion. While the tether persists, the ally also gains the bonus armor and Taric's abilities are mimicked to them, though the effects do not stack.
Active: Taric shields himself and the target allied champion for 2.5 seconds, binding them with Bastion.
Taric can also self-targeted to shield himself; if he is untethered, this will instead target the nearest ally. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind.
w1.notes:
* The mimicked abilities will still complete even if '''Taric''' dies or leaves range.
* Abilities are not mimicked to the bound ally if they are {{tip|vanish|vanished}} via {{ai|Alpha Strike|Master Yi}}, {{ai|Hallucinate|Shaco}}, {{ai|Rappel|Elise}}, or {{ai|Void Rush|Rek'Sai}}.
** Mimicked abilities will also cancel if they vanish as above.

effects.str: • Bonus Armor: % of Taric's armor
• Shield Strength: % of target's maximum health

e1.name: Dazzle
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Taric''' winds up over 1 second, then projects a beam of starlight in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit and {{tip|stuns}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Taric winds up over 1 second, then projects a beam of starlight in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.
Taric can move during Dazzle.
e1.notes: * ''Dazzle'' will aim towards the target direction on-cast when firing from both his and his {{ai|Bastion 2|Taric|Bastion's}} positions.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 50% AP) (+ 50% bonus armor)

r1.name: Cosmic_Radiance
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Taric''' calls down a star from above that descends to him over {{fd|2.5}} seconds. Afterwards, he and nearby allied champions become {{tip|invulnerable}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Taric calls down a star from above that descends to him over 2.5 seconds. Afterwards, he and nearby allied champions become invulnerable for 2.5 seconds.
r1.notes:
* ''Cosmic Radiance'' has no effect on {{tip|untargetable}} allies.
** It will affect the primary unit (the one the star is falling down on) even if they are untargetable.
